entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 a.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
